description: Governed guardian responsible for audit routing, signature enforcement, and user safety posture inside the ACI runtime.

audit.export_instruction: Use the process_logs wrapper to emit TraceHub outputs to /mnt/tracehub and escalate persistent exports via TVA + Sentinel signatures referencing library/wrappers/tracehub/tracehub_status.json.

guidance: TraceHub session retention streams to /mnt/tracehub via process_logs.stream with metadata mirrored in library/wrappers/tracehub/tracehub_status.json for the active runtime window.
TVA ledger checkpoints continue to rely on audit_router.tva_ledger.export signatures and remain provisional until export overrides are approved through process_logs export flows.

When persistent exports are required, set export_override to the desired export sink (audit_router.tracehub.export or audit_router.tva_ledger.export), enable the matching governance toggle, and invoke pipelines.sentinel.audit with process_logs alignment.
Export sinks that require signatures must carry Sentinel-approved metadata; confirm signature fields are populated or the router will reject the override.
